hero.content: ASU Shrooms Society is dedicated to fostering an inclusive community of students and others interested in learning about and appreciating the diverse world of fungi.
hero.heading: What we do

events.eventDesc: Learn how to grow your own gourmet and medicinal mushrooms using simple low-cost methods. This hands-on workshop covers everything from selecting the right species to harvesting your first flush.
Learn how to grow your own gourmet and medicinal mushrooms using simple low-cost methods. This hands-on workshop covers everything from selecting the right species to harvesting your first flush.
